title: PagerDuty Integration with Tier-Based Defaults
description:
Complete PagerDuty integration with tier-based escalation policies, team-prefixed naming, and support models.

**Completed:**
- Tier-based escalation timing (critical: 5/15/30min, low: 60min)
- Team-prefixed naming (payments-primary, payments-escalation)
- Support models (self, shared, sre, business_hours)
- Official SDK integration (pagerduty.RestApiV2Client)
- Event Orchestration for alert routing
- Alertmanager config generation
- Routing labels on generated alerts
- Resilient setup (continues on partial failures)
- Placeholder user for schedules

**Remaining:**
- Team membership (manager role for API key owner)
- Service dependencies in PagerDuty
- Demo site integration
- Documentation
